sectionBookTest.title: Global leader in electric mobility solutions
sectionBookTest.description: As a leader in electric scooter manufacturing, we provide daily green mobility solutions for urban commuters and commercial operations worldwide. Plus, we always have promotions to make your switch to electric even easier.

vmotoApp.title: VMOTO APP
vmotoApp.description: For those who seek a connection with the world around them

bottomBar.copyright: Â© 2025 Vmoto Limited - All rights reserved

vmotoTeam.description: Our swift progress can be attributed to a visionary management team that excels in research and innovation. Comprising visionaries, creatives, entrepreneurs, and mobility enthusiasts, our team is dedicated to revolutionizing transportation. Their commitment to creating a sustainable lifestyle drives our focus on delivering top-quality and high-performance products. By prioritizing sustainability, our team ensures that Vmoto remains at the forefront of urban mobility, consistently pushing the boundaries of what's possible in electric vehicle technology.

ivanTeo.name: Ivan Teo
ivanTeo.title: Finance Director at Vmoto.
ivanTeo.description: A finance executive with over 19 years of experience in international businesses, including automotive, manufacturing, mining, and retail. A Chartered Accountant with significant Western and Asian experience. Holds a Bachelor of Commerce from the University of Adelaide. Currently responsible for financial operations and strategic financial planning at Vmoto.

martinZhou.name: Martin Zhou
martinZhou.title: Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.
martinZhou.description: Experienced motorcycle industry executive with over 36 years in roles at national and international companies in China and Japan. Instrumental in Honda Japan's strategic acquisition and cooperation with China's Sundiro Group, facilitating technical and product development agreements. Graduate of Shandong University, specializing in internal combustion engines, and holds an MBA from Yamaguchi University. Currently in the role of Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.

blairSergeant.name: Blair Sergeant
blairSergeant.title: Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.
blairSergeant.description: Experienced public company executive with roles as managing director, finance director, and non-executive director across diverse industries. Chartered Secretary and Associate of the Australian Certified Practising Accountants. Holds a Bachelor of Business and Post Graduate Diploma in Corporate Administration from Curtin University. Currently in the role of Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.

aaronKidd.name: Aaron Kidd
aaronKidd.title: Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.
aaronKidd.description: Over 15 years in M&A and capital markets at global banks and private equity, specializing in natural resources and energy transition. Started at Goldman Sachs, led Credit Suisse's Perth office, now heads Zephyr Capital in Perth. Holds Bachelor of Laws (Hons) and Bachelor of Commerce (Hons: Corporate and Investment Finance) from University of Western Australia, with honors and academic awards. Currently in the role of Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.

grazianoMilone.name: Graziano Milone
grazianoMilone.title: CMO & President of Strategic Business Development at Vmoto.
grazianoMilone.description: Over 15 years in M&A and capital markets at global banks and private equity, specializing in natural resources and energy transition. Started at Goldman Sachs, led Credit Suisse's Perth office, now heads Zephyr Capital in Perth. Holds Bachelor of Laws (Hons) and Bachelor of Commerce (Hons: Corporate and Investment Finance) from University of Western Australia, with honors and academic awards. Currently in the role of Non-Executive Director at Vmoto.

vmotoSmartConnectivity.title: READY FOR YOUR BUSINESS
vmotoSmartConnectivity.description: Sharing is easier with Vmoto: our scooters can be equipped, directly at the production stage, with wiring compatible to your sharing platform.
vmotoSmartConnectivity.platformDescription: The 4G APP prepares Vmoto scooters for integration with the third-party computing ecostystem. You can receive your fleet solely with integration-ready wiring or already complete with IOT, programmable to your needs.
vmotoSmartConnectivity.canbusDescription: The CAN-bus standard allows a real-time ad high transmission rate connection. Improved wiring layout enables stability of the electronic control system, promoting better ride management.
vmotoSmartConnectivity.solutionsDescription: We offer a comprehensive and full solution for electric moped sharing business. Our vehicles need low maintenance: easy dis-assembling and assembling design, anti vandalism and theft-proof solutions, special ride sharing features.
vmotoSmartConnectivity.apiDescription: Vmoto APIs enable fleet vehicles to communicate easily with any IT ecosystem, thus simplifying connection with the third-party app and saving a net amount of time and money.
vmotoSmartConnectivity.appDescription: Our vehicles can also be equipped with our proprietary app, which enables connection between you, your vehicle and the cloud in a smart and convenient way.

warranty.title: Warranty
warranty.subtitle: Travel safe and secure
warranty.heading: Vmoto Warranty Information
warranty.welcome: Welcome to the Vmoto Warranty Information page. Here you will find all the details regarding the warranty coverage for your Vmoto electric scooter or motorcycle. Understanding your warranty ensures you can enjoy your vehicle with peace of mind, knowing that you are covered for any manufacturing defects and supported by our professional service network.
warranty.warrantorIntro: This warranty is provided by Vmoto Soco International, with headquarters located at:

warrantorLocations.vmotoLimited: Vmoto Limited: Level 48, 152-158 St Georges Terrace, Perth, Western Australia 6000, Australia
warrantorLocations.vmotoInternational: Vmoto International: 15, Zhongxing East Road, Lishui Economic Development Zone, Lishui District, Nanjing 21 1200, Jiangsu Province, China
warrantorLocations.vmotoEurope: Vmoto Europe: Boekweitstraat 95-97, 2153 GK Nieuw Vennep, The Netherlands
warrantorLocations.vmotoItaly: Vmoto Italy: Viale Fratelli Casiraghi, 427, 20099 S. San Giovanni, Milan District, Italy

warranty.coverageDescription: This warranty covers the original purchasers and subsequent owners of Vmoto electric scooters and motorcycles that are imported and sold through authorized Vmoto dealers.
warranty.whatCoversDescription: Vmoto warrants that each product is free from defects in material and workmanship during the warranty period. The warranty covers essential parts such as: battery, hub motor, frame, swing-arm, motor controller, wiring, shock absorbers, brake assemblies, wheels, throttle, fairings, any factory-installed accessories.

notCoveredItems.unauthorized: Products not supplied by Vmoto or unauthorized dealers
notCoveredItems.maintenance: Routine maintenance, wear and tear, and cosmetic issues
notCoveredItems.misuse: Damage caused by misuse, racing, or unauthorized modifications
notCoveredItems.altered: Products with altered or removed identification numbers
notCoveredItems.incidental: Incidental or consequential damages (e.g., loss of time, income)

warranty.durationIntro: The warranty period starts from the date of delivery to the original purchaser:

durationItems.general: General parts: 2 years or 12,500 miles, whichever comes first
durationItems.battery: Battery: 3 years or 30,000 miles, whichever comes first

responsibilitiesItems.understanding: Understanding and following the product manual and warranty terms
responsibilitiesItems.laws: Learning and obeying all relevant laws and safety practices

warranty.contactDescription: For more information or to contact Vmoto, please visit this page or contact your nearest authorized dealer.

factory.title: OUR FACTORY: THE HEART OF ELECTRIC INNOVATION
factory.description1: Encompassing a sprawling 30,000 square meters in Nanjing, our state-of-the-art factory stands as the heart of innovation in electric motorcycles and mopeds. Here, precision meets passion, as advanced manufacturing technologies harmonize with a commitment to sustainability.
factory.description2: From the meticulous assembly lines to the bustling research labs, every corner echoes with the hum of progress and the dedication of our skilled workforce. It's more than a manufacturing facility; it's a beacon of excellence, driving forward our mission to redefine urban mobility with eco-friendly solutions.
factory.description3: At Vmoto, our mission is to lead the charge in sustainable transportation through cutting-edge technology, unmatched performance, and a relentless pursuit of innovation. We are dedicated to creating eco-friendly vehicles that not only meet but exceed the expectations of modern urban mobility, ensuring a cleaner, greener future for all.

faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.subtitle: UNLOCKING THE WORLD OF ELECTRIC SCOOTERS
faq.welcome: Welcome to our FAQ page! Here you'll find answers to some of the most common questions we get about our electric scooters, both for personal and business use. Whether you're looking for information on our products, our policies, or how to get started with electric scooters, we're here to help.
faq.contactPrompt: If you can't find the answer to your question here, please don't hesitate to contact us by visiting our 'Contact Us' page. We're always happy to help!

evChoice.question: Why choose an ev rather than an icev, while purchasing a new vehicle?
evChoice.answer: Electric vehicles offer numerous advantages including lower operating costs, zero direct emissions, quieter operation, and often better performance. They also benefit from government incentives and lower maintenance requirements.

marketStatus.question: What is the current status of the global ev market in the world?
marketStatus.answer: The global EV market is experiencing rapid growth, with increasing adoption rates worldwide. Many countries are setting ambitious targets for EV adoption and manufacturers are expanding their electric vehicle lineups.

environmental.question: How do electric scooters contribute to environmental sustainability?
environmental.answer: Electric scooters produce zero direct emissions, helping reduce air pollution and combat climate change. They also require less energy and resources to manufacture and maintain compared to traditional vehicles.

customerSupport.title: CUSTOMER SUPPORT
customerSupport.heading: CONNECT WITH OUR EXPERT SUPPORT
customerSupport.description: For inquiries or further information about our cutting-edge products and services, please fill the form and contact directly our Customer Support, or use our listed contact details. We have a team of amazing humans who'd love to help you.

dealer.networkTitle: A network, a way to live
dealer.networkDescription: 65 countries, over 100,000 customers enjoying the ride and support of our ever-expanding dealer network: become part of the change.
dealer.businessOpportunity: With Vmoto, you will have the opportunity to live an exciting personal and professional experience, joining a business with great potential and the prospect of making a real difference.
dealer.promise: Ours is a promise to the more than 1,500 dealers worldwide and more than 100,000 consumers who have already chosen us. Vmoto is constantly working to make a difference in urban commuting.
